医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新分子有望保护小鼠免受流感侵害瑞典哥德堡大学的研究人员与中国同事合作，发现了一种类似抗体的分子，可以保护小鼠免受各种流感病毒的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-molecule-shows-promise-in-protecting-mice-from-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-molecule-shows-promise-in-protecting-mice-from-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe1eca76-fa2d-4e52-8a8d-b8ab6e3d1862 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 07:25:00 -0500 New molecule shows promise in protecting mice from influenza
希腊北部学龄前儿童报告细小病毒 B19 心肌炎病例心肌炎是一种罕见但严重的疾病，因心肌（也称为心肌）炎症而闻名。在严重的心肌炎病例中，心肌变得极其虚弱，无法有效地泵血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Parvovirus-B19-myocarditis-cases-reported-in-preschoolers-from-Northern-Greece.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Parvovirus-B19-myocarditis-cases-reported-in-preschoolers-from-Northern-Greece.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2afd48ef-0427-4c46-ae9d-4fce3024af17 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 07:01:17 -0500 Parvovirus B19 myocarditis cases reported in preschoolers from Northern Greece
肠道微生物和身体共同调节脂肪代谢威尔康奈尔医学院和康奈尔大学伊萨卡校区博伊斯汤普森研究所的研究人员进行的一项新的临床前研究表明，有益的肠道微生物和身体共同作用，微调脂肪代谢和胆固醇水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Gut-microbes-and-the-body-work-together-to-regulate-fat-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Gut-microbes-and-the-body-work-together-to-regulate-fat-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95b917eb-b657-4ce9-9bcb-df40b286cb9e Thu, 09 Jan 2025 06:47:29 -0500 Gut microbes and the body work together to regulate fat metabolism

在妊娠期糖尿病研究中，口服药物预防大婴儿的效果不如胰岛素一项比较口服降糖药与胰岛素治疗妊娠期糖尿病的研究发现，在预防大于胎龄儿方面并无非劣效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Oral-medications-less- effective-than-insulin-for-preventing-large-babies-in-gestational-diabetes-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Oral-medications-less- effective-than-insulin-for-preventing-large-babies-in-gestational-diabetes-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62820f26-45f2-4427-bf94-66d87c023e83 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 06:05:00 -0500 Oral medications less effective than insulin for preventing large babies in gestational diabetes study
气候变化威胁着青少年的心理健康。以下是如何帮助他们应对的方法。我们都读过故事并看过图像：危及生命的热浪。山火来势空前猛烈。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Climate-change-threatens-the-mental-well-being-of-youths-Heree28099s-how-to-help-them-cope.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Climate-change-threatens-the-mental-well-being-of-youths-Heree28099s-how-to-help-them-cope.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3cfad03-3ae1-4da6-9783-8cc0faa31bbc Thu, 09 Jan 2025 05:36:49 -0500 Climate change threatens the mental well-being of youths. Here’s how to help them cope.
15 岁之前吸烟会显着增加患慢性肺病的风险一项研究表明，儿童时期吸烟会显着增加成年后慢性阻塞性肺病的风险，强调需要针对年轻吸烟者采取有针对性的预防策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Smoking-before-age-15-significantly-increases-risk-of-chronic-lung-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Smoking-before-age-15-significantly-increases-risk-of-chronic-lung-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7dd47bef-b5fa-4d4a-93f0-be84fb986cd5 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 05:13:00 -0500 Smoking before age 15 significantly increases risk of chronic lung disease

Geneoscopy 完成了 1.05 亿美元的 C 轮融资，为下一代胃肠道诊断测试提供动力Geneoscopy, Inc. 是一家生命科学公司，专注于开发促进胃肠道健康的诊断测试，今天宣布完成 C 轮融资，筹集 1.05 亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Geneoscopy-closes-24105-M-in-series-C-funding-round-to-power-next- Generation-of-胃肠道诊断测试。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Geneoscopy-closes-24105-M-in-series-C-funding-round-to-power-next- Generation-of-胃肠道诊断测试。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57105332-8ebf-4c66-a845-d82fd3efef19 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 04:39:00 -0500 Geneoscopy closes $105 M in Series C funding round to power next-generation of gastrointestinal diagnostic tests
